preparation.raw_text:
1. Measure out 10 g of bismuth using a precision scale. 
 2. Measure 1 g of iron. 
 3. Measure 20 g of scandium. 
 4. Measure 1 g of selenium. 
 5. In a clean, dry container, combine all measured materials thoroughly until uniformly mixed.
